plugins.name: 3Dscript
plugins.description: Create high-quality 3D/4D animations using a natural-language based syntax.

plugins.name: Action Bar
plugins.description: Extend ImageJ's graphical user interface, providing one (or many) easy to use button bar(s).

plugins.name: BAR
plugins.description: Broadly Applicable Routines, containing macros, scripts, and plugins focused on data analysis, image annotation, and image segmentation.

plugins.name: BigDataViewer
plugins.description: Re-slicing browser for terabyte-sized multi-view image sequences developed with multi-view light-sheet microscopy data in mind.

plugins.name: BigStitcher
plugins.description: Simple and efficient alignment of multi-tile and multi-angle image datasets.

plugins.name: Bio-Formats
plugins.description: An open source solution for converting proprietary microscopy image data and metadata into standardized, open formats.

plugins.name: BioVoxxel Toolbox
plugins.description: Image filters, lighting correction, threshold tests and binary image modification algorithms and variable 2D object analysis tools.

plugins.name: BoneJ
plugins.description: Bone image analysis, including tools for trabecular geometry and whole bone shape analysis.

plugins.name: CLIJ
plugins.description: GPU-accelerated image processing offering about 100 predefined OpenCL-based functions allowing you to run your workflows on any GPU.

plugins.name: Coloc 2
plugins.description: Pixel intensity correlation over space methods of Pearson, Manders, Costes, Li and more, for scatterplots, analysis, automatic thresholding and statistical significance testing.

plugins.name: FigureJ
plugins.description: Easy article figures with links to original images and processing history

plugins.name: MaMuT
plugins.description: Combines TrackMate and BigDataViewer for browsing, annotating, and curating annotations for large image data.

plugins.name: MorphoLibJ
plugins.description: Morphological filtering and reconstruction, watershed segmentation, 2D/3D measurements, and binary/label images utilities.

plugins.name: Multi-Template Matching
plugins.description: Object recognition using user-provided template(s)

plugins.name: SciView
plugins.description: 3D visualization and virtual reality capabilities for images and meshes.

plugins.name: Script Editor
plugins.description: Develop scripts dynamically within ImageJ: multiple languages, syntax highlighting, language-specific templates, and more.

plugins.name: SNT
plugins.description: The ImageJ framework for neuronal reconstructions.

plugins.name: TrackMate
plugins.description: An open and extensible platform for single-particle tracking.

plugins.name: Trainable Weka Segmentation
plugins.description: A collection of machine learning algorithms with a set of selected image features to produce pixel-based segmentations.

plugins.name: TrakEM2
plugins.description: Morphological data mining, three-dimensional modeling, image stitching, registration, editing, and annotation.
